arg.g: historical events that accompanied them in Contemporary Lovers

example.parse: وأعلنوا جميعهم ربط * مصيرهم بمصيرها، أي اذا انسحبت فينسحبون واذا بقيت فيبقون.

arg.g: with it Fate, that is if it withdraws they will withdraw and if they remain they will stay
